title: Innergie Magic Cable Duo - 2-in-1 USB Cable with Micro USB, Apple 30-pin iPod / iPhone Connectors - 2.6 feet / 79cm
description: The Magic Cable Duo provides you with one cable to charge and sync your portable devices. With USB 3.0, you will experience ultra-fast transfer rates for syncing and the integrated smart multi-tip 2-in-1 design means you can use it for Apple as well as devices with a Micro USB connector (Blackberry, Smart Phones and more). The Magic Cable Duo was designed for use with Apple iPod, iPhone and iPad and is certified for use with these devices.
